This same attitude and energy can be aligned with anything that you do in life....making and finding the time that you don't have can be difficult but the rewards that come with it make it all worth. Work hard so you can play harder!!!!!! #Message
The point that I'm making is that neither one of us had the time but we found the time because we knew the value and the potential reward behind the meeting.

For example....I'm shooting a movie at the moment & I wanted to meet with someone of importance. I asked them if they wanted to make this meeting a priority and they replied yes....so they flew to me and we met at 6:30am for 2hrs before I went to work.
Things that make me laugh....When I hear people say that they don't have time....We have time people...the real question is are you willing to make time? That's the real question....
I honestly HATE close talkers...why are people that comfortable with invading your personal space????? STEP BACK DAMN IT

People keep asking me "Why are you so positive all the time" my answer is very simple...A positive mindset will bring positive results. All I want is results...Lets gooooooooo people!!!!!
Success/Greatness is EARNED....Its not given. Go fucking EARN yours people....Go be Great in whatever it is that you do...Make your time/presence on this earth felt.

Growth is everything....I am chasing greatness...I'm not only chasing it for me & my family...Im also chasing it for this next generation...I really want people to understand that the sky can be the limit of you believe it...

But what I have figured out is that know life story is a story worth telling without some type of hardship or bump in the road....We all need to go thru some level of bullshit...it makes us all better.

My mind is wondering on this beautiful Saturday...I'm just thinking about life and the amazing opportunities that life gives us. Sometimes the amazing things are hard to see because of the way that they are presented to us.

I believe in equality and I want it for people of color more than anything. Right is right and wrong is wrong. This matter hit home because it’s where I’m from. My heart goes out to those men that were treated horribly. Shit is truly sad that we are still going backwards

The last thing that I will say on this matter is..before we jump out the gate with anger sometimes it’s ok to think first...how many people of color are employed by that company? How many families are being taken care of because of the income that’s being provided by said company

I was simply saying not to boycott before seeing what the company was going to do....after watching the interview that the CEO of @Starbucks did on @GMA I feel that they failed in doing what they should have done. Now actions can be taken...

I also felt that the company should of stood up and addressed the matter and made us feel comfortable in understanding that this wrong doing would never happen again...and that they should of addressed the victims with a apology etc

You obviously don’t comprehend well...I asked @Starbucks to make the situation right...I asked them to fix it. I said that the person on duty should of been held accountable.https://twitter.com/k23veroni/status/985940518176743428 …
